content:
Hello! My name is Emanuel and I am a beginner on Rust and compiler internals, but I have just read this blog post:
https://blog.rust-lang.org/inside-rust/2019/12/02/const-prop-on-by-default.html
and got excited to learn more and start contributing on compiler optmizations. i just don't know where to start.

If anyone has any advice, I am all ears!
@Emanuel Lima you might want to check out the #t-compiler/wg-mir-opt stream
@Wesley Wiser, @oli, @Santiago Pastorino are some of the folks that are most involved there afaik, though I don't follow those efforts super closely so I'm probably overlooking people
hi @Emanuel Lima, as Niko have said, please jump to the stream and we can talk and find things to do. Probably @oli and/or @Wesley Wiser are more aware of what are some thing pending to do
Yeah, I'm sure we can find something for you to work on :)
